entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 11 April 2023
